results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to see food item types displayed in different colors so that I can quickly identify the food type visually.
results.optional_explanation: The story is overly specific about color codes, which are implementation details. The core goal is to enable quick identification of food types, making it a manageable, focused story.

results.corrected_us: As a reader, I want to bookmark pages so that I can easily find relevant content later.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear and well-defined, with no problem identified.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save my list so that I can access, print, or email it later.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear and focused, with no issues.

results.corrected_us: As a blogger who codes, I want the blogging system to display my GitHub activity so that my readers can see my coding contributions.
results.optional_explanation: The story involves technical integration that provides value to readers, not just technical capability, so it is a valid user story.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save, copy, print, and email my list so that I can manage it for future use, shipment checks, or sharing with restaurants.
results.optional_explanation: The story is too broad, combining multiple actions into one. It should be broken down into smaller stories for each action.

results.corrected_us: As a tester, I want detailed test plans so that I can thoroughly verify the system once it is completed.
results.optional_explanation: The story is too broad, covering all testing activities. It should specify creating detailed test plans for specific features or modules.

results.corrected_us: As a business user, I want a report of item profitability so that I can identify profitable items and address underperformers.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear and focused, with no issues.

results.corrected_us: As a system, I want to store customer account info and order lists in the database so that the system can manage customer data and orders.
results.optional_explanation: The story is technically focused but describes system behavior that provides value; it is acceptable.

results.corrected_us: As a customer ordering food, I want to locate my previous order lists so that I can review and reorder them easily.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear and user-focused, with no issues.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want my custom item code to stand out on the screen so that I can find it more quickly.
results.optional_explanation: The story specifies a visual cue (stand out) rather than implementation details, making it a focused, manageable story.

results.corrected_us: As a blogger who codes, I want my GitHub activity displayed in my profile so that readers can see my coding contributions.
